website_summaries.verdict: This mini split system offers you the ability to control your air conditioning with an app on your smartphone.
pros: This well-built, quiet, and easy to install system is very reliable
Offers remote access to controls through the MRCOOL app
cons: The line that comes with this set is 25" long, which might mean extra tubing for some shorter installs

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 600sq ft detached dallas garage
customer_reviews.text: Heats and Cools my Dallas detached garage. Wifi feature is great. I leave it on auto and 70 degrees and heats and cools as needed.Have not touched it in months. Had a handyman install it for $200 so I cannot speak for install. I do know that wiring to an outlet was required. It took him about 6 hours to install start to finish. Also this one was the right choice because it could be wired to a existing outlet, had I got the bigger units (18k) I would have had to buy new wire and pay to have it run to the garage. This would have added more than $300 to the project at least.
customer_reviews.author: alfman3310

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The system was extremely easy to install, took a little over 2 hours and had it up and running, super quiet, and well built.
customer_reviews.author: Clyde Banks

customer_reviews.title: This is not truly DIY, the electrical is separate from the unit.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this expecting to be able to install it ourselves, we have installed two others in the past. This unit does not include the electrical, we had to have an electrician come out to hook it up. This added a lot to the cost of the unit. It also says you can switch the refrigerant tubing to the other side, which is not true, or cannot easily done. Very unhappy about the misleading information in this listing.
customer_reviews.author: Linda T.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, Super easy to Install and super quiet.
customer_reviews.text: The best system ever. It took me 2 hrs to unpack and setup the unit. It cooled my 350 sq ft room down to 74 degrees in about 15 minutes. The auto settings have kept the room at 74 without the up and downs that come with the traditional central air systems. And it is super quiet. A great product.
customer_reviews.author: A. Soto

customer_reviews.title: Answer for a DIY. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Works well. I have a 24 x 40 garage with a 16 x 18 finished room in it. The 12k is in the room and the 24k handles the rest of the garage. Heats up fast and not expensive to run. Super quiet. Only problem was the trucking company wouldn't deliver on my street. After 3 extra days and a lot of phone calls to dispatch I had to go meet them and load them into my truck. I have had many other truck deliveries to my house.
customer_reviews.author: Life is Good

customer_reviews.title: Unless you are a licensed tech, no warranty.
customer_reviews.text: We had ours for almost a year before it stopped working. Of course, if you go to their website, it says this.. Proper installation – Limited warranty applies only to systems that are installed by a state certified or licensed HVAC contractor, under applicable local and state law in accordance with all applicable building codes and permits; MRCOOL installation and operation instructions and good trade practices. So for a DIY, it literally has NO warranty. So very sad. For us it was a LOT of money to invest in something that didn't even last.
customer_reviews.author: D. I.

customer_reviews.title: A cool product, efficient and quite.
customer_reviews.text: It is very cool indeed. A year after installing it, which was not difficult, I can say it is great. Cools our large bedroom quickly, by far faster than the central air-condition for our living room floor. I placed it with some reservations right above my bed, but as it turns it is very quite. The only downside is that I was never able to configure its Wi-Fi. The manual must have been translated, and poorly, from some other language, probably Chinese.
customer_reviews.author: michal

customer_reviews.title: Connections too fragile, leak refrigerant
customer_reviews.text: The first unit I installed began leaking from the copper connection on the air handler, soon after it was removed from the box, and before it was even mounted on the wall. Apparently the design is too fragile for normal installation, and the quality lower than expected. The warranty on the product is robust, but the work involved to exchange the unit is significant. Given it's size and weight, I would prefer quality over a warranty any time,
customer_reviews.author: grshpr

customer_reviews.title: I installed this myself and I couldn't be more pleased. Super quiet
customer_reviews.text: I installed this myself and I couldn't be more pleased. Super quiet, you would not know it was on except for the room temperature. The only extra components I needed were the electrical breaker box and wiring back to the fuse box, plastic conduit to cover the pipes back to the external unit and a mounting bracket so I could wall mount the external unit.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: NO HEAT FUNCTION
customer_reviews.text: So, I bought this unit for full climate control in my add-on office. Cooling function is AMAZING. Works fast, is quite, and very efficient. After winter came around, I switched it to heat mode. Nope. Only cold air. Did some troubleshooting to make sure I hooked it up right. I did. Seems the reversing solenoid doesn't work or something. Contacted seller, they said contact manufacturer. Contacted manufacturer, they said contact seller. Multiple attempts, zero service. Stuck using a space heater to heat in the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Pratt

customer_reviews.title: The best DIY system you can buy
customer_reviews.text: This unit is incredible! It cools, heats, dehumidifies and has a fan as well... works incredibly well in our tiny house and is one of the purchases we're most proud of. Only down side? No 'smartthings' or remote support (eg you cannot set temps while away, cool the house before you arrive, etc.)
customer_reviews.author: MatlockFam

customer_reviews.title: Looks Ugly, too much hose, BUT this thing is AWESOME !!!
customer_reviews.text: Too much hose, looks ugly on the outside, but inside looks great. This thing works like a dream for my 160 sq ft lofted shop. It's miserable outside, but I'm warm and toasty inside. The louver device evenly distributes the airflow, So I really don't need a ceiling fan assist
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEST DIY AC SYSTEM
customer_reviews.text: Unbelieveable AC DIY system, looks great, quite, cools great, easy install for my husband. Will be buying additional systems for our home.
customer_reviews.author: CANDY

customer_reviews.title: A can do DIY with some knowledge
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to install, but this should not be your first DIY projects. As others have noted - the directions are somewhat lacking as they are written for multiple products within this line. The unit itself is truly whisper quiet, and having been in operation for several weeks is exactly as described. Thanks Mr. Cool.
customer_reviews.author: T Glass

customer_reviews.title: Garage is as cold as ice!
customer_reviews.text: Installed this unit myself in a 600 sq ft workshop attached to my garage. Unit effortlessly cools the room to 70° on even the hottest of days. Currently under a heat advisory in Indiana The unit is performing great . Unit installs fairly easily with one person and an assistant. Only feedback I would give to the company is to offer a short and long size line sets, As the the average install requires nowhere near the 25 feet included so you're dealt dealing with a lot of additional coolant line.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation. Just follow the instructions
customer_reviews.text: Easy installation. Just follow the instructions. Works great for our bonus room. Heat and cooled 360 sq ft. no problem at all.
customer_reviews.author: IT Geek

customer_reviews.title: So great customer service there
customer_reviews.text: Accidentally ordered two and didn’t even noticed. Thanks to the vendor that reach out to verify and corrected the order, everything was fixed. So great customer service there! Installation was so easy, quick and dummy proof, kit comes with everything you need. Product looks and works amazing. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Maritza Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Maybe the second try will be better
customer_reviews.text: First unit leaked and lost the charge, So I thought I may have installed it wrong. They gave me no problems and sent me another unit that I had installed by an HVAC professional. He tested it and said that the levels were off but he seen worse. So far so good but it’s only been four days I’ll keep you updated.Also quick sidenote when I put the new condenser on with the original blower He said there was air in the lines in that the system needed to be purged and refilled he made no money off me so I know he wasn’t blowing smoke I would suggest buying a Mitsubishi. That will certainly be my next purchase.
customer_reviews.author: karla Burgos

customer_reviews.title: They really are DIY
customer_reviews.text: Very simple to install for someone who is generally handy. Units are very well packaged for safe shipping. Just be aware that it is helpful to have 3 people to mount the wall unit in order to avoid kinking the lines. Otherwise, normal installation can be done by 1 person and should on;ly take a few hours. So far I am very happy with the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Great system for a non-A/C qualified technician person
customer_reviews.text: Great system for a non-A/C qualified technician person. I believe anyone with basic DIY skills can successfully install this unit....I did.
customer_reviews.author: billie joe sanders jr

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and quiet
customer_reviews.text: It's quite, relatively easy to install. This is my 2nd unit and I really like both.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: My first foray into the mini-split world. Easy and works like a charm. Extremely quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Gantner

customer_reviews.title: This unit is amazing. Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: This unit is amazing. Easy to install. We've had 95+ weather in the past week and it's been able to keep up. Haven't found a need to change the temp from 72 or have the fan on high.
customer_reviews.author: Scottie Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Easy install
customer_reviews.text: I installed by myself in about 3.5 hrs. Works great!!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: this unit keeps our room cool and operates very quietly
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy install, unit running great
customer_reviews.text: Easy install, unit running great. It took about 4 hours to install. That is including running the power to it.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Almond

customer_reviews.title: Too easy. Everything is included
customer_reviews.text: Finished installing it about an hour ago, so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: THE Bot

customer_reviews.title: Great split AC system which fully met my expectations
customer_reviews.text: Great split AC system which fully met my expectations. This is a great DIY project. For my setup I needed a wall mounted bracket which was an easy install too. The only tools needed for install which I didn't own was the torque wrench which I picked up at harbor freight and the 1" and 1-1/16" crows foot wrenches for the torque wrench I got off Amazon. The AC operates very quiet and cools the area off very quickly. This system is much, much better than the noisy window unit we had.
customer_reviews.author: TimMAz6

customer_reviews.title: I purchased the MR COOL units to replace two LG 7
customer_reviews.text: I purchased and installed two of these units in a well insulated cottage. Unfortunately, the units are not able to keep up with moderately hot days (+85F). I purchased the MR COOL units to replace two LG 7.5k btu window units but they just don't do the job. The min splits were supposed to have 12k btu capacity but based on my experience I would say they are more like 5k btu. I previously installed a Frieidrich Breeze in a different cottage and that product was fantastic. I wish the MR COOL product was half as good as the Friedrich.
customer_reviews.author: nt49flyer

customer_reviews.title: These are great units. This is my third one and I ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great units. This is my third one and I have installed the other two a few months ago. They cool great in Florida and have had no problems. The installation is not hard and there are good directions. The only complaint: The 25 feet of line you have to run through the wall is attached to the inside unit, so you have to put the entire line through the wall. It would be nice if it was attached to the outside unit and you would only have to put a few inches through the wall. I have no idea if that would work, but anyway, the unit is a great overall product.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent M. Riordan

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Easy install, awesome quiet unit, great price, and easy to deal with folks.
customer_reviews.author: RDA

product_meta.title: MRCOOL COMFORT MADE SIMPLE 12k BTU 17.5 SEER MrCool DIY Ductless Heat Pump Split System - Wall Mounted, White
product_meta.description: This intelligent on-off technology enables MRCOOL products to automatically enter energy-saving mode when on standby, cut energy consumption from the normal 5W to 1W, which amounts to saving 80%.
